name: Scrambled: Syd City
description: The choice between good and evil, with a human life in the balance... is only a bang away.

name: I Want to Pursue the Mean Side Character!
description:
Beatrix is used to being misunderstood by her fellow peers.
With her sharp eyes, tall height, and ringlets, she looks like the mean villain straight from a novel.

Thus, she decided that if she was forever going to be seen as the mean bully, she might as well reside herself to the role.

However, things change when she becomes fast friends with the new commoner transfer student, to everyone’s surprise including her own.

And more weirdly, how this new transfer student can seem to understand her better than anyone else and can see her for her true self rather than the part she had been reluctantly forced to play!

name: Closing Spaces
description: Carefree delinquent winning the heart of a closed-off twin.

name: Occult Crime Police
description: The Truth Is Pretty Out There

name: Void Stranger
description:
Void Stranger is a 2D sokoban-style puzzle game where every step counts.

Descend into the forgotten labyrinth teeming with fiendish foes and traps that defy reason. A swift defeat lurks at every corner for those who neither study their surroundings nor think their moves through with care.
Trust you wits and slowly, surely, you will conquer the mysteries before you.

You do remember why you are here, right?
Or have you lost something?
Something very important to you.

name: What-ever Happened to Ruth MacArthur?
description:
'What-ever Happened to Ruth MacArthur' is an interactive narrative experience where you are in search of a missing woman who left leaving only a trail of audiotapes behind her.
Explore a richly detailed, hand crafted environment, and experience the suspenseful narrative.

name: A Nightmare on Sesame Street
description: Freddy Krugar is haunting Elmo's dreams. Will you be able to find a way to wake up before he kills you?

name: A Final Delivery
description: Take a package to a disused cemetary

name: Mycorrhiza
description:
Mycorrhiza is a love letter to horror manga in the form of a visual novel. Some of our biggest inspirations include the works of Junji Ito and Masaaki Nakayama.

While Scott is trying to find a way back home, reality distorts and people’s morals start shifting in cruel and unexpected ways. A peculiar plant transforming animals, a horrifying comedy trend and a strange building trapping people. Each of the three arcs explores different terrors.

As you explore this terrifying world, you'll find out more and more about how and why Scott is trapped in it and what lead up to Scott being spirited away.

The game features a manga aesthetic with animated CGs and character art drawn by a manga artist, a focus on elaborate audio implementation, as well as an honest attempt to make the game accessible by providing visual audio cues and a dyslexic font option.

name: What Grows in the Night
description: Sin descripción

name: Haunted Corny Maize
description: Welcome to Bailey's Corn Maze! Where during this autumn season you can explore a fun little maze and maybe find a bit of romance along the way. Play as a young woman venturing into the maze all by herself, but with the chance of running into a few monstrous maids that are dealing with some issues ranging from mundane inconveniences to their own personality quirks getting in the way to being literally trapped in the maze until someone rescues them.

Yuri visual novel retelling of the fairy tale Bearskin.

Penniless after returning home from the war, Isako makes a deal with the demon Maku. In exchange for an endless amount of money, Isako must survive ostracization and attempts on her life for seven years without once asking for help. Should she fail, she yields her soul to Maku.

Can Isako come out alive?

The instructions are simple; you can jump between the white and the black dimension by using either "z" & "x", or the left and the right arrow keys. Pause with "p", restart a level with "r". You can also return to the title by pressing "t", when the game is paused.

name: Space Bounce
description: We present you the hyper/super/duper/x-tra game, the boredom killer and the mental pain maker, Space Bounce. It's a simple game, with simple mechanics and a simple purpose: to score the highest score. All you have to do is to dodge the asteroids and the planets, and if you hit them, you will lose some hp (which is in the left of the screen), but if you do not you may conquer the Space!

name: AstroSurfer
description: Surf through space and chill, take care not to hit anything dangerous!

name: Sticky Keys
description: Sticky Keys is a game with the theme of "Small World". Use your typing skills to gain score by typing on an incredibly nasty keyboard.

name: Space Shadow
description: Space Shadow is a survival space shooter game in 2D .

name: Frantic Freddie
description: This game is a remake of the game "Frantic Freddie". The goal of the game is to have Freddie collect all the pots of gold on each level while avoiding all of the enemies. Optionally collect bonus items to earn more points (10,000 points earn an extra life). When all pots have been collected on a level, you will advance to the next level. What makes the game unique, is that the platforms are connected with telephone poles instead of ladders and Freddie cannot walk past a pole. He must climb up one side and down the other. Enemies however can move past the poles! There are 16 levels of increasing difficulty, featuring different enemies on each level. The earlier levels feature 3 enemies each and the later levels have 4 and 5 enemies. Enemy speed increases gradually each level. Every two levels there are interludes to give the player a short rest.

name: Equilibrium
description: A narrative game on the journey of a woman in depression, played with a controller.

name: Late Night Breakfast

name: Little By Little By Little
description: Little By Little By Little is a slice of life video game following a day in the life of an ordinary college student whose hyperfixation on local graffiti keeps them distracted from their rapidly declining mental health. The game touches upon depression and anxiety, drinking culture, self esteem, and complicated relationships - and how those struggles intersect with everyday life. It also explores the healing power of friendships and the importance of being vulnerable.

name: ORB
description:
Millennia Ago, an empire spanning the galaxy collapsed after a long and brutal war.
In the Aldus system, two orphaned races slowly evolved on two separate planets. Both
races believed that they were unique and alone in the universe.
They were soon to find out that they were neither unique nor alone.

name: Agoraphobia

After arriving at college, Joyce struggles with a yet-undiagnosed panic disorder while attempting to find direction and acceptance among their peers.

Their panic disorder distorts the world around them, rendering an otherwise friendly world overwhelming and horrific.

In search of respite, they stumble across their campus's art studio and begins to make peace with themself.

name: A Bit of Light
description:
Find the balance between your obligations and passions while taking care of yourself.

Follow the life of our little protagonist as the weekend unfolds.

Spend your time wisely and make every activity count. As you make choices, you'll see how your head fills with positive or negative thoughts, so make sure you also try to rest a bit so your head doesn't clutter. Try to find the four different endings!

A game to remember where I've been and where I am, and hold the feeling I had when I came out of therapy and realized I might just be ok.

With three unique game modes, 20+ ship types, and dazzling visuals, this game is sure to amaze! Not much more needs to be said, build a massive fleet and watch the fireworks! It also contains the most brilliantly written and acted story of all time, so don't miss out!

After a huge fight with his roommates, Ivan finds himself in the apartment alone. As the sun rises and he considers whether or not going to work, he re-explores his apartment and reminisces about past experiences. He’s reminded of the importance of family, friends, and respite.

So if you are a Goro Akechi fan and have him as your husbando, you need to play this game to fulfill your Goro Akechi needs.

name: Captain Explosion

name: Cars vs. TNT
description: Drive with A/D. Speed up and slow down with W/S. Don't explode, and make it to the finish quickly! Cars vs. TNT is an arcade racing game that was made in 1 hour 45 minutes. Your high score will be saved to the local device.

name: Re Parry

name: Dogforce: Seasons
description: Dogforce: Seasons is a high-scoring, combo-chaining, secret-hiding dog simulator that challenges you to get as much dog business as possible done in 45 seconds. It features spring, summer, and winter seasons!

description: Become a space cowboy.

name: Outfoxed
description: Stealthy

description: They say when this place calls, one must heed.

description: Say 'HELLO' to the Corporation.

description: An exploration game about finding secrets.

name: Backwards
description: Uncover the secret the game itself is hiding.

name: Swatch

name: Bigface Marsh
description: Obtain footage of an elusive cryptid in this survival horror game!

name: Escape Evolution
description: Evolve to know the truth behind your existence!

name: Lyssophobia
description: The less you know the better.

name: Code Adventure
description: A simple plattformer of a guy who tries to correct all the bugs of his game with his code gun.

name: Dot Ninja

description: Co-op sloth action for 1-4 players!

name: Secret Agents
description: Top down 2 players shoot-em-up for TIC-80

name: Linecook
description: These busy birds will eat almost anything that falls into their gullet -- what will you feed them? They have their preferences, but people food beats bird food any day of the week! A difficult, chaotic arcade game with local multiplayer support!

name: Game of Throne
description: Race your housemate home to take a poo

name: DirectionDungeon!
description: An abstract puzzle game with strange movement.

name: Meine Tierpension
description: Sin descripción

description: A well-known puzzle, now for 2 players! One plays the game, while the other picks blocks for him.

name: Starlight Explorers
description: Chart a course for adventure in this lighthearted, all-ages physics sim that will take you to the stars.

name: Push Puzzle: Rescue Adventure
description: Push and move objects to save animals and build a new rescue center.

name: AFK Summoner
description: AFK Summoner is a strategy RPG with AFK gameplay and various features. Summoners can recruit heroes , build a mighty team to explore the land! Heroes fight even when you are away, so write your legend with hands freed!

name: Maya's Dice
description: Maya's Dice is a 2D puzzle-based RPG using the bluffing dice game, Liar's Dice, as a unique and dynamic battle mechanic. Players experience a cyberpunk world and a narrative that questions morality and one's core values.

name: Crawlspace
description: You've been tasked with crawling into a crawlspace to retrieve some dolls. what could go wrong? VR Only

name: Task Force 88: Hostile Contact
description: In Task Force 88: Hostile Contact, TF-88 pits their elite team against Chaos, a vicious mercenary unit relentlessly causing world-wide anarchy. You choose which side you're on, and you'll battle in three exotic locales, Castle, Favela, and Desert, as well as in a bonus mystery map.

name: Kid Hallow
description: Wear different costumes to get past different challenges in this precision puzzle platformer. Then build your own challenges in the level editor!

name: Castle Life
description: Castle Life - A game about castle defense, in which the player accumulates money, buys archers and swordsmen for defense, improves his castle, collects gold, calls for rockfalls and fights off catapults.

name: Dim-Egion
description: Single Player Shooting Game with 2D Collision Detection and 3D Rendering

name: Mini Island: Winter
description: Mini Island: Winter is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty!

name: The Robin
description: The Robin tells the story of a school bully who kills a girl named Robin. Thirteen people involved are kidnapped and embark on a desperate journey to survive. The work revolves around who is behind the black hand and who is responsible for the death of Robin these two questions unfold.

name: Dr. Mario
description:
Dr. Mario was remastered for the Super Famicom and released as a stand-alone Nintendo Power service release, only in Japan, and also for the Nintendo Gateway System. The game also received a Satellaview broadcast.

The same version was previously bundled with Tetris and released in the West as Tetris & Dr. Mario.

name: Easy Racer
description: Easy Racer was a 1996 downloadable game for the Satellaview. It is a very simplistic racing game with an overhead perspective and no visible characters other than the cars; however, the ending screen does feature Mario.

name: Sweet Honey Action!
description: Sweet Honey Action! is a simple platformer for the Satellaview.

name: Pazule & Breddo
description: A simple puzzle game for the Satellaview.

name: Flower
description: A simple platform/action/puzzle hybrid for the Satellaview.

name: Wonderful My Race

name: Riddle School 4
description: Phil plans a fourth school escape, but what does his university have to offer?

name: Jubilee
description: Challenging precision platformer based on tight, fluid movement. Open map layout with multiple routes. Collect gems and save animals.

name: Portal: Epic Edition
description: Portal: Epic Edition is widely regarded as one of the most Epic mods to ever hit ModDB and the Portal community as a whole, featuring the iconic campaign of Portal remastered to become more epic to play through, featuring crossover elements with the Half Life series and more!

name: Hentai Sherlock
description: Enigmatic psycho challenges famous detective. Help Sherlock solve riddles and overcome challenges on his way to save the local town from bombing by stopping a mysterious madman.

name: My Loving Wife
description: This is the story of you and your wife. Every day you come home from work to see her and the two of you spend time together. You love her moew than anything and hope you're time together will last forever.

name: Winter Dream
description: Caron meets three interesting girls after moving in with his uncle during his winter vacation

name: The Legend of the Darkest Night
description:
This game is an action shooter platformer, with a lot of interesting things.
After completing the main story you can start playing challenge levels.
Complete the levels, collect power-ups, earn rewards, listen to the music.

name: Skullfracture
description: Skullfracture is a tridimensional fighting game inspired by Smash Bros where you kick, punch and throw your way to victory by launching the opponent out of the ring!

name: Alanna: The Princess of Puzzles
description: Enjoy this awesome game full of monsters, pixel art based, with excellent music, 4 bosses and 20 levels to explore the castle, use swords and bows, get familiars, a lot of items, and solve different puzzles to go to the next area.

name: I want to keep a Windy
description: A short 2000's VIPRPG game which follows the life of a protagonist in his moments with different Windys throughout different time periods of his life(a Windy being a disposable servant whom which has one day to live upon renting).

name: Diggy
description: Dig your way to the center of the earth in search for great treasures. Upgrade your equipment to help you along the way

name: Curl Up and Fly!
description: Launch your armadillo as far as you can! This is a launch game with a few twists... fly and dive to collect coins and avoid mines/balloons while floating.

name: Fleeing the Complex
description:
Somewhere in a far off land, where the snowy mountains meet the sea, lies a prison complex. Welcome to The Wall, the 'home' of some of the baddest and smartest criminals from all over the world. Henry has become the newest resident.
There are FIVE different endings in this game and SIXTY unique fails! Also, the new map system makes it super easy to jump back to any scene you've already seen.
There is a lot of content in this game which is why the load time is so large. Why not watch the release teaser/intro while you wait?

name: Slime Time
description: A bullet-hell shooter where you use the backfire of your weapons to move.

name: Kamikaze Veggies
description: A stealth adventure game with an absurd-driven story and third-person perspective for a single-player or co-op. Complete secret war missions, solve the showy puzzles, and save the veggies world!

name: Achievement Unlocked 3
description:
Does reading this text earn you an achievement? Well, no, but 400 achievements await you in this latest installment in the AU franchise. Once again play as the Blue Elephant as he makes his way through complex puzzle maps in his quest to earn all achievements and escape to freedom.

But beware; King Hamster (who is actually a guinea pig... but don't tell him that) won't make it easy on you. And while spikes, flaming rodents, and perilous pits await you, ultimately your foe is time itself. So good luck on your most elephantastic adventure!

name: Slaughterhouse Escape
description: A fun action physics game with a deadly twist, help the animals escape, collect the keys to free your friends and move through the challenging levels, but remember to always stay away from the slaughter room.

name: Solitaire Chronicles: Wild Guns
description: Saddle up and head out to the wild West! Shannon and Red Wolf have been astray for a while when they bump into a deserted town. Can you help them resurrect the settlement? Use the power of cards and match 3 to build a safe haven in SC: WG!

name: Stick RPG 2: Director's Cut
description:
Thrust into an unfamiliar and bizarre city, find your place amongst the strange citizens by earning money, buying property and building up your stats. Collect the mysterious trans-dimensional artifacts to solve the mystery of Paper Thin City!

The Director's Cut contains tons of new content not available in the online version.

• New areas to explore and new quests to complete
• A total of 25 careers, including Lumberjack, Professor, Escort, Personal Trainer, Light Knight and Dark Lord
• 18 new weapons
• 3 new combat zones
• All cheats unlocked
• Online and offline saving
• Expanded romance system
• 2 new mini-games
• 30 trophies to earn
• Full original soundtrack in MP3 format

name: Myth: A Guff's Tale
description: Journey through the twisted labyrinth of a Grumbling Cave Troll. Your imagination is the key to every locked door, the sword that will slay any foe!

name: Impact Point
description:
IMPACT POINT! – A Fast Paced 2-4 Player Top Down Multiplayer 2D Shooter. Be the last man standing to win!

2 Maps, 5-10 rounds, 9 different weapons, 16 cosmetics, and more to come!

name: Dangerous Descent
description: Sin descripción

name: Death of the Diseased
description:
Fight trough tons of zombies in different maps, upgrading your statistics with the aquisition of Exploration Tokens and Upgrades. Try to get a great score, getting points by getting kills.
Play solo or with a friend in local multiplayer!

name: Creepy Mahjong
description:
You can escape if stuck, but winning or escaping might lead you to a new area and face different challenges.

With the Level Editor, you can create your level design and share it with your friends for an endless challenge!

name: Project User
description:
We are ready to tell the first story ...
We hope you can dive in and explore our short story.
Everyone dreamed of immortality, but what a terrible price to pay.
And how far will your ambition take you ...

name: BlastFort Knight's Shield
description: The Knight's Shield Expansion Pack for BlastFort unlocks 2 new player skins, a brand new force-field item, and an exclusive item skin!

name: DIYCraft2D
description: Game contains classic survival mechanics like crafting based on combining, gathering resources and food, farming, hunting animals, building shelter and defending from enemies.

name: Esplode.
description:
A little arcade-type game about avoiding asteroids and collecting fuel to keep flying

sounds and music coming soon

name: Algernon
description: Chase a mouse through a strange infinite maze.

name: Rocky Ruins
description: You solve puzzles to get further through the level. Your goal is to come to the end of the ruins to escape the dry desert.

name: The Place of Jinn
description:
This is a horror game.
The player starts in a haunted place and tries to escape.

name: The Desolation
description: Classic Third Person Shooter

name: LeukoBlast!
description: Sin descripción

name: Apex Legends: Loba Edition
description: Traffic in victory with the Apex Legends: Loba Edition.

name: The Tainted
description: The Tainted is a mature comedy, turn based, 2D RPG. You explore the land of Xanthia in an attempt to solve the mystery of the Taint and learn how to stop it.

name: Dead Sector
description: Dead Sector is an immersive souls-like where you fight against mysterious creatures and use their life energy to charge your own equipment. Try out the Demo and find out why the sector lost contact with the surface.

name: Avature
description:
You have to go with the player on an amazing journey in which you will draw your way to achieve the goal.

Aveture is a colorful 2D platformer where the player traverses levels along any path.

name: Aliens Attack
description: Aliens Attack is a 9 levels shooter Arcade video game. Winning each level is challenging and Adrenaline Booster. The game is enjoyable and will make you fun. Winning a level is simple: Kill enemies, and escape from bullets and obstacles.

name: Henite
description: Henite is a platformer of a cute girl that likes to eat mushrooms, try to collect them all!

name: Make 'Em Pay
description:
Make them pay is a party game featuring different ways to have fun with your friends with one thing at hearth: Winning aint easy.
Amongst a giant crowd or as a stealthy vampire. Who cares about friendship when you just can make em pay !

name: Balldemic
description: Sin descripción

name: My Little Roguelike
description: My Little Roguelike is an exciting roguelike game where every run is unique.

name: Slimekoban
description: Sin descripción

name: Flying Hero: City on fire
description:
Colorful arkanoid game gives you chance to rescue people from fire!
You’ll be a real fireman in different cities.
Catch bonuses and improve your skills!
Dynamic fascinating game!
More levels, more fun!

name: The Forgotten Dungeon
description: The Forgotten Dungeon is a simple yet challenging platformer in which you take the control of an adventurer trapped on a dangerous dungeon filled with traps and enemies that want to kill you. Would you survive and reach the exit?

name: Catch it!
description: Collect strawberries and beware of bombs! 3 difficulty levels and other modes are waiting for you!

name: False Server
description: A game developer launching his discord server while a pandemic is going on outside in the real world.

name: Drone Control
description: Sin descripción

name: LindaBee
description: The hive is in need of some good workers. Get ready to avoid the frog, since all they want is to eat some tasty bees.

name: An Essay on Insipidity II
description:
An Essay on Insipidity II, also known as Essay II, is an adventure game that follows the tragedy of a peasant and hunter named Arkhip, which finds himself in the middle of a harsh winter alongside his family, who are almost famishing. With no other options, Arkhip goes out of his home on a journey in hopes to trade their last pouch of money with the local communities for food.
Said journey will also take him deep inside his own soul.

name: Watch TV
description:
A retro, point and click styled horror experience with a heavy importance on sounds and awareness.
You must finish your show however the horrors are creeping in...

name: Code War
description: Multiplayer FPS PVP game with many modes included where players can dominate battlefield or singleplayer mode with target elimination mode. Choose wide selection of arsenal weapons. Customize your characterand choose few available maps.

name: The Evil Church
description: Evil Church is a Survival-Horror/Action Shooter

name: Axolotl Museum
description: Axolotl Museum is a short game about the axolotl. Learn about the axolotl's habitat, food, predators, and more!

name: Developer Showdown
description: See Popular Game Developer Kill Each Other!!!

name: Go on Forever
description:
Go on Forever is an infinite runner game! You have levels that you can do and you can see any many coins you get or how long you can survive!

5+ Levels that you can do!

Creative and fun levels designed by our great designers

name: Trayveler
description: A short platformer made for the Godot Wild jam (29)

name: Torpedo Run
description: Sin descripción

name: Switcheroo!
description: A puzzle platformer where you can Switch planes!

name: Block Annihilator
description:
Block Annihilator is simple to play, beautiful, and familiar to people that like arcade and casual games.
We have glowing balls, colorfull blocks that explode and lasers it all happens in space.

name: Smitty's Journey
description: A 2D puzzle platformer adventure, set in a bustling continent of Dripsdale, natively inhabited by droplet-like creatures called Dropples

name: BDEF: Base Defenders
description: Plan your defense tower placement wisely so as to guide the enemy bots through a path that will ensure they spend as much time as possible within the effective ranges of your defensive towers.

name: Z-Virus
description: You are trapped alone in the dark place with the infected. This is your chance to escape and have your revenge. This game is inspired by the Resident Evil series.Gameplay involves fighting enemies in tight corridors, solving puzzles etc.

name: Mariuccha, Alchemy Queen
description: Mariuccha is an old elven with a dark, tragic past, trying to make amends for her sins by opening an alchemy shop with the help of her ghost boyfriend Mr Testamentin.

name: Cute Adblocker
description:
Shoot Advertisements instead of people!
You must find your way out of a prison by destroying ads in your way, with help from a humanoid, Libre.
There are many types of advertisements like TV Ads, Internet Ads, Download buttons, and more!

name: Backrooms
description:
A horror game; but with full lights on!

Backrooms brings a nostalgic feeling of being lost in endless empty rooms with fluorescent lights at full hum-buzz.

You have to find your way out, but some "friends" don't want you to leave.

name: Bomb Defusal 1010
description: It's a funny game about a lazy furry!

name: Ship War
description: Ship War is a board game transferred to the PC, in which a player takes turns with a bot to attack at coordinates on an opponent's unknown map.The main task is to destroy all ships.

name: Fatty Shark
description: In „Fatty Shark” you play a hungry predator who needs to eat to grow big! The Fatty Shark has inherited the control and the basic game style from Flappy Bird, but this game is much more!

name: Last Debt
description: You owe powerful people a lot of money. Start from the bottom - working as a cleaner in fast food and become the director of a large campaign.

name: Conventional Tennis!
description: It's just Pong, OK? Anime Pong!

name: Rune of Tauro
description: A fantastic game that draws us into the world of adventures and dangers that stand in the way of the main character.

name: Pixel Mage Quest
description:
Pixel Mage Quest is a retro RPG game mixed with modern sandbox gameplay experience.

You can play this game as your own! Fighting monsters, questing, gathering resources, crafting items and much more!

name: False Rebirth: Enhanced Edition
description:
A game about finding meaning of life when everyone's dead.

False Rebirth is a psychological, story-focused game about the last remaining human, and his search for meaning in a post-apocalyptic world.

name: Chaincards: A Poppo Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Buggy Battle
description: Fight in battle ,collect loot, buy weapons, armor, shields and modifications and become champion in BUGGY BATTLE.

name: GMZN: The Little Game Experiment
description: Just a little platform game experiment with GDevelop for learning purposes.

name: Officers and Crime
description: Dynamic, realistic, top-down shooter. Nice interface. Pumping the character, because we can eventually get xp units, and spend them to increase the clip of an assault rifle, or to increase the dexterity of the character.

name: ShapePlacer
description: A simple game based on the classic tetris mechanics. Fill up lines to gain score and don't let the shapes reach the top. Made with the Godot Engine 3.1.

name: Postman Simon
description:
Postman Simon is a 2D platformer, inspired by early '90s videogames.
In the game you help Simon the postman complete difficult deliveries in dangerous places.

name: IslandWide Flying Simulator
description: IslandWide Flying Simulator is a cartoony aircraft pvp game, focusing on a fast-paced team-based competitive gameplay. The game takes inspiration from the real world of combat aviation starting from world war 1

name: Squeaky Squirrel
description: Join Squeaky one single squirrel that took it upon himself to protect his homeland from the evil machines trying to destroy the beautiful green and peaceful forrest.

name: Nedoida
description: Discover and explore a beautiful, mysterious world in a single player adventure full of puzzles and secrets

name: Source of Power
description: ​Source of Power is a Space Opera RPG with elements of Epic Fantasy, following both heroes and villains on a grandiose adventure with friendship, romance, and ancient evils, set in a universe where technology borders on magic.

name: A Part of Life
description:
A part of life is an life simulator game 2d/Top down style with many things to go and explore hope you enjoy it .
Rkgames953.itch.io
is our official store at itch check it for more games.

name: Lemon Pending
description: Help Lemon God Sell lemonades!

name: Suddenly She's Here
description: One day, Oscar finds a girl in his room after waking up. Her name is Mika and she claims to have known him and his family for a long time. And his everyone else believes this too!

name: The Weird One
description: Camille plans to confess her feelings to a friend of hers. However, what she doesn't know is that this guy is much weirder than she thinks. Will Camille be able to tell Dave how he she feels about him?

name: Bunbun Tower
description: Bunbun returns to work at the cafe tower after she completed her therapy. The problem is that she never did return. Instead, Bunbun getting stuck in a loop of horror awaiting her with monsters and her faceless doppelgangers hanging around.

name: School for the Friendless
description: Harold ends up going to a school for people with no friends. Here, students are paired together and whoever they're paired with become their roomates, regardless of gender. What if he gets with a girl?

name: The Caves
description: Sin descripción

name: Jump & Escape
description:
A small game where you need to jump on asteroids until you reach your ship and escape.
All graphics, sprites and sounds were downloaded from free and all credits go to the creators (Kenney and others).

name: An Essay on Insipidity
description:
"An Essay on Insipidity", also known as Essay I, is a purposely bad RTP-made game that aims to be a quick character study and observation of a poverty-living Honduran child named Ernesto, who uses RPG Maker to make a game to try and cope with the harsh reality he lives in.

The dialogue is a mishmash of broken to unintelligible English and Spanish.

name: Chaincards
description: Chaincards is a JRPG where you play as Chain, a young wizard whose goal is to find out his master’s magic notes to reveal the secrets behind his mysterious death

name: Musle vs Zombies
description: Kill the zombies

name: VrUs
description: V is in a unknown place and lost his family; now he needs to run, scape from bad guards and create a new family until they feel again at home.

name: Soaper
description: Pass the ultimate soap test!

name: Impossible Cleaning
description: He is trying to do his job but now kids are in quarantine and the cleaning is impossible!

name: The Dead Blue Adventure
description: Draw your path and get to your son in this complex puzzle adventure game. Put yourself in Dead Blue's black and white world and draw your path between the spiked edges of this dungeon like world.

name: Cactus McCoy and the Curse of Thorns
description:
A treasure hunter for hire, with a curse on his soul, and a bounty on his head.

The ancient Curse of Thorns has taken hold of its latest victim, a man now known across the Wild West as Cactus McCoy. It all started when McCoy was hired by Hex Hatfield to find the Thorned Emerald. Unaware of the jewel's curse, McCoy was transformed into a walking, talking, brawling cactus. Now it is a race against time to bring the Thorned Emerald back to its proper home before Cactus McCoy is turned to a lifeless stone cactus.

This platforming brawler game will have you wielding tons of weapons as you traverse a strange Wild West world of hidden treasures and seemingly endless enemigos. Can you become the toughest Cactus in town, and break the ancient Curse of Thorns?

name: Sky Serpents
description: Sky Serpents is an action-platform game released on October 22, 2010. The player becomes a Slayer that wants to beat his father's record at slaying giant beasts called sky serpents.

name: Hanabi Fantast
description:
This is the fascinating firework simulation game!
Save the theme park "Fireworks Land" that is loved by everyone!
Gather firework materials at each stage and create specified or original fireworks for each area.
Launch your fireworks on the beautiful stage of the Fireworks Land that is brilliantly drawn in 3D!

name: BomberGast
description: This game is a bomberman game just like any other. But in this game, you can play along with many friends! You can play with up to 4 players in total.

name: Creatures of Energy
description:
In this game turn based game you grow your creatures to destroy the enemy ones.
The board is made out of angle pieces which can rotate. A group of connected pieces is a creature.

name: Knightmare Treasure
description: KnightMare Treasure RPG Game is a Roguelike all about exploring constantly changing dungeons, filled with a variety of different enemies and treasures to find. Equipped with an arsenal of weapons.

name: Homecoming
description: It is an indie psychological horror game in which you must solve the mystery behind the Dewey family while various entities try to hunt you down and torment you. Will you be able to survive and escape this infinite loop?

name: Tale of the Gallant Jiraiya
description:
Danger. Romance. Adventure.
All legends contain heroes, this is the tale of the legendary hero Jiraiya, Young Thunder. Jiraiya helps the innocent and fights the wicked bandit leader Orochimaru. Witness his legend unfold in our Visual Novel!

name: Saving Synthwave City
description: A simple arcade-style game about steering a rocket away from buildings to save the city below for as long as possible. Control your missile with your mouse. Fly close to the ground for more points, and pick up bonus stars for a score boost!

name: Crowned
description: Crowned is an innovative MOBA game, combining stunningly simple mobile controls with deeply strategic & tactical gameplay. Brought down to the essence of esports: High tension from the first second, ultra addictive competition, wrapped in quick matches. A mobile-first MOBA game: Enjoy esports anytime, anywhere.

name: Dog Pound Theater
description: Sin descripción

name: Beyond the Dark
description:
Demon, Hell, the Beyond!

After being locked in a unknown location. All you know is that you need to keep the lights on, and find a key to get out of there. A demon from Beyond lurks inside the darkness , retching for your soul!!!

name: Virgil's Purgatory
description: Virgil is a man who was decapitated, now he must wander through his own purgatory in search of his true head and perhaps eternal rest. Take your chances with this little metroidvania game.

name: Crusader Party
description: Crusader Party is an online multiplayer game of stealth and cunning, where a handful of human players find cover within a sea of identical-looking NPCs. But only the last surviving Crusader will emerge victorious from the battlefield.

name: Crimson King's
description: Go and explore different dungeons to gather items and craft new strong weapons and armor. Collect items to unlock new powerful character from normal to legendary's and god type a unique battle system to enjoy playing with.

name: Eman Quest
description: Experience a procedurally-generated mini-RPG with memory-based battle mechanics, in an epic quest to save Aisha's parents from an unknown evil! Our unique memory mechanics challenge to you use not just your wits but your memory to succeed!

name: Eleven
description: This short puzzle game is a tribute to the great Netflix show Stranger Things. The creator of this game owns NO right to the original material on which this fan game is based on. This game is also free and does NOT generate any revenue.

name: The Fall Of Rallys Factory: Episode 1- The Fallen Hopes
description: The Fall Of Rallys Factory is a horror puzzle game, in this game you will be in the role of William Milligan, who is looking for a way out of an abandoned Robot factory

name: Journey of a Sprite
description:
Why are u in a dungeon?
Who are you?
Discover all this playing Journey of a Sprite
A RPG Game where you play in a dungeon!!

name: Ali the Android
description: To save Earth from being overrun by the Hive, the Khalifa dispatches you to a derelict deep-space research station. Does it hold the key to winning the war, or sinister secrets?

name: PocketWorlds
description: Solve the puzzle by exploring and obtaining resources in a cubic world

name: Puzzle League
description:
Puzzle League (also known as Panel de Pon Multiboot) has been released with several Panel de Pon games. It was first released on February 7, 2003 in the Nintendo Puzzle Collection alongside Panel de Pon (GCN). This game would later get released internationally in English under the localized Puzzle League name in the GBA compilation Dr. Mario & Puzzle League alongside Dr. Mario.

This the only Panel de Pon fairy aesthetic game to be officially translated in English (Since Panel de Pon (SFC) was not translated in the Nintendo Switch Online release as it simply reuses the Japanese ROM), albeit with it's title screen replaced. The game features Pupuri, the Flower Fairy Mascot who makes an appearance in both this game and Panel de Pon (Nintendo Puzzle Collection).

name: Battle of the Heroes
description: Collect coins and kill your enemy every stage has boss enemy make sure you buy some fighters.

name: Misty Isles
description: Sin descripción

name: Project Retro Ninja
description: Defeat the monsters and bring peace to your village again!

name: Spacedust Defender
description: Enroll as a [Defender] and take up the mission to protect your solar system from the threat of an imminent Bluul invasion!

name: B-Minus 50
description:
How high can you die?
Control the short-lived alien lifeform Moebs, who has 50 heartbeats to live. Propel as high as possible by using his elastic telescope eyes. Gain Momentum to slingshot upwards but remember:
Every move is a heartbeat.

name: My Very Own Train Station
description: There are many different trains you could take - which one will you take?

name: Its an idle life for me!
description: Sin descripción

name: BRG's Red Riding Hood
description: Meet Maisie, a child who is loved by all. She dons her favorite red coat & becomes Red Riding Hood. Journey with her to experience dazzling visuals and an immersive audio experience. Make a life-changing decision that will alter the story.

name: The Walsingham Files: Chapter 1
description: Detective Sara Fitzgerald transfers to a small town in her home state of Massachusetts. What seems to be a new and peaceful life for our protagonist is soon turned upside down when a double homicide occurs in a nearby nature reserve.

name: Preternatural Candy Shop
description: The candy business is not going well but they are making effort to get a positive outcome in the coming festival. However, Mercury tends to make hazardous sweets while Sabrina trying to prevent chaos.

name: Alchemy
description: Enter a world full of magic, mystery, beautiful landscapes and dangerous creatures. Gather materials, use elements as attacks, recombine them into building blocks... and use your Alchemist's power to give life to any shape you built.

name: Post War
description: An indie 2.5D post-apocalyptic adventure designed in pixel art

name: GoreBall: Remastered Edition
description: Gore Ball is a fast paced EXTREMELY DIFFICULT medieval hack n slash, zombie fighting bat n ball game. It is a mixture of genres that collide but mix really well. This is not a game for the faint of heart. You have been warned!

name: Das Geisterschiff Remixed
description: Das Geisterschiff Remixed contains four remixed & rearranged tracks by Daniel Northwood, Chronomantique, Skinny and Romanus Surt.

name: Shizoku: Shuriken Brawl
description: Shizoku is a local multiplayer game where Samurais and Ninjas come together to play tennis, but the ball is actually a Shuriken. Painful, huh? Well they had to stay in shape someway!

name: Dasher 3D
description:
Dasher 3D is a top down shooter with time-freezing. And it's controlled with only one button as it's a part of Feldo's 1-Button Jam!

You are the Dasher, a lonely sprite that shoots and well... dashes around. A group of angry bots have attacked you in huge numbers, but you can do something that they can't: Control the time! As you dash around and stop, time freezes and lets you decide to either shoot, or to dash again.

name: SwordVania
description: In this game you are a knight platforming his way through a hostile kingdom. I tried to implement some light metroidvania elements like acquiring weapons that opens new areas that you could not explore before.

name: Amelia: The Drought Curse
description: A first-person Dark Adventure that takes place in a cursed village of northeastern Brasil. You can explore the open world village, investigate the curse and fight for survival while being haunted by an evil witch that lives in the Darkness.
